text: Zombies on Broadway (or Loonies on Broadway in the UK) is a 1945 American horror comedy movie directed by Gordon Douglas and starring Wally Brown, Alan Carney, Bela Lugosi, Anne Jeffreys, Sheldon Leonard, Ian Wolfe, Jason Robards Sr., Darby Jones, Russell Hopton. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1945 comedy movies Category:1940s horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Gordon Douglas Category:Movies set in the Caribbean
title: Zombies on Broadway
